column3:
Maru is keeping his distance from a nearby crate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Use the Daemir Demolishers on the mudstone mound in the Shroud of the Samgha.
Obtain the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone.
Deliver the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone to Maru.
I've been meanin' to ask you this for some time, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, but truth be told, I was nervous. Thought it might be too dangerous...
But then Kancana told me that your adventures've tossed you into the maw of death an' back again. I figure handlin' some explosives is child's play compared to that...right?

...Well, you're still here, so I'll take that as a sign of tacit agreement. We need someone to break up the mudstone around Ksiroda an' bring back a piece. The alchemists keep tellin' me this is the best way, but...just mind your fingers, alright?
There you are─an' with fingers an' toes still attached! I take it that means the alchemists were right after all.
Good, good─these'll do it. Mixin' mudstone into water makes a paste that keeps the skin safer from sun an' wind than just about anythin'.
You might not think it to look at 'em, but hippos have a delicate hide. If you don't keep it nice and moist, it'll crack like so much mud on a hot day. We're really in your debt this time.

Sure, maybe you could've just broken up the stone with a hammer an' chisel...but now I don't gotta worry about someone accidentally settin' those demolishers alight an' blowin' us all into the next life, neither.
